summary: App for writing projects with multi-character creation: one combined character questionnaire that captures traits/backgrounds (incl. family-tree roles) for multiple characters at once and automatically generates separate character profiles.
known_issues: Latest build attempt failed: 'AI struggled with your request. Please rephrase or break it down into simpler steps.'

existing_features.title: Add a new multi-character questionnaire flow that lets the user define and fill out multiple character profiles in one continuous guided questionnaire, with an emphasis on family-tree style grouping (e.g., mothers, fathers, grandparents, kids; plus male/female/other distinctions) so the user can complete all characters at once instead of repeating the same questions per character.

When the multi-character questionnaire is submitted, automatically create separate character profiles in the currently selected project (one saved character per person defined in the questionnaire), and refresh the Characters list to show the newly created characters immediately.

Integrate the new multi-character questionnaire entry point into the existing Characters page UI alongside the current single-character creation and the existing “Create Band/Group” wizard, so users can choose the appropriate creation mode.
Produce and deploy a new draft build of the app after implementing the multi-character questionnaire update so the user can test it.

new_feature_requests.summary: Multi-character 'giant questionnaire' that collects per-character traits/backgrounds (incl. family-tree roles like mothers/fathers/grandparents, male/female/kids) in one flow and auto-creates separate character profiles from the answers.

projectName: Create a multi-character “giant questionnaire” that generates character profiles (new draft build)
